code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import moment from'moment';import'moment/locale/es';import'./Clock.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";moment.locale('es');const Clock=()=>{const[time,setTime]=useState(moment().format('LTS'));const[date,setDate]=useState(moment().format('dddd, D [de] MMMM [de] YYYY'));useEffect(()=>{const interval=setInterval(()=>{setTime(moment().format('LTS'));setDate(moment().format('dddd, D [de] MMMM [de] YYYY'));},1000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"clock-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-clock"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"date",children:date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"time",children:time})]});};export default Clock;
